name: circuit-runner
description: A runtime program that takes one or more circuits, compiles them, executes them, and optionally applies measurement error mitigation.

circuits.description: A circuit or a list of QuantumCircuits or a list of QASM 2.0 strings.

shots.description: Number of repetitions of each circuit, for sampling. Default: 1024.

initial_layout.description: Initial position of virtual qubits on physical qubits.

seed_transpiler.description: Sets random seed for the stochastic parts of the transpiler.

optimization_level.description: How much optimization to perform on the circuits (0-3). Higher levels generate more optimized circuits. Default is 1.

init_qubits.description: Whether to reset the qubits to the ground state for each shot.

measurement_error_mitigation.description: Whether to apply measurement error mitigation. Default is False.

return_values.description: Circuit execution results in a RunnerResult object.
